card.name: Zoey's Club Survey
card.description: Zoey asked everyone in her English class to complete the survey and they all did!

context.potentialUses: The questions can help recommend a club to join based on your interests and personality.
context.potentialMisuses: The data only came from people in our school and community - be careful about using it in different schools.

fields.description: Which of these activities do you like the most?
How do you like to spend your time?
Which of these elements is your favorite?
How do you feel about the following statement: "I like to make and build things with my hands"
How do you feel about the following statement: "I like to learn new things and meet new people"
What is a club you would want to join or are already a part of?
